result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Nicholas James Size

defendant.name: Size, Nicholas James

records.addlTxt:
1:52 PM Defendant Nicholas James Size appeared by phone.  Attorney Mark David Lawton appeared by video for Nicholas James Size.  Prosecuting attorney Clifford C. Burdon appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
2022CT000011, 2022CT000022 & 22CM24 tracking together:
Atty Lawton received an offer recently; the defendant is working on getting a valid drivers license.  Atty Lawton requests another status.

BY THE COURT:  Set status
bond continued
Status hearing scheduled for November 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Status hearing on November 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

2:22 PM Prosecuting attorney Clifford C. Burdon appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Nicholas James Size appeared by phone.  Attorney Mark David Lawton appeared by video for Nicholas James Size. 
2022CT000011, 2022CT000022 & 22CM24 tracking together:
Atty Lawton was just appointed on the cases; requests another status.

BY THE COURT:  Set status
Defendant is to pay Attorney fees
Status hearing scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Status hearing on September 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant
Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt:
3:47 PM Prosecuting attorney Clifford C. Burdon in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Nicholas James Size appeared by phone. 
2022CT000011, 2022CT000022 & 22CM24 tracking together:
Court questions the defendant regarding the offer.  Defendant received the offer a couple days ago and would like to discuss a couple things on the offer.  Court confirms address.  Atty Burdon states that the defendant is free to argue the sentence.  Defendant asks if he is still able to get an Attorney.  Defendant thinks he will qualify for Public Defender.  

BY THE COURT:  Reset
Status hearing scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Status hearing on July 18, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

11:41 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian J. Juech appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Nicholas James Size appeared by phone. 
2022CT000011, 2022CT000022 & 22CM24 tracking together:
Court has not received the paperwork for a court appointed Attorney; he has decided that he is not going to get an Attorney.  Court finds waiver of attorney made freely, voluntarily & Intelligently. 
The State will mail an offer to the defendant now that he has waived his right to an Attorney.

BY THE COURT:  Set another status
bond contined
Status hearing scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Status hearing on June 27, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

3:21 PM Defendant Nicholas James Size appeared by phone.  Attorney Brian Juech appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
2022CT000011, 2022CT000022 & 22CM24 tracking together:
Court questions the defendant.  Defendant had the time wrong.

BY THE COURT:  Warrant quashed

Court questions the defendant regarding an Attorney.  Defendant doesn't qualify for Public Defender.  Defendant asks the court to appoint an Attorney.

BY THE COURT:  Court advises the defendant to fill out the paperwork.
reset
Status hearing scheduled for May 23, 2022 at 11:45 am.
Status hearing on May 23, 2022 at 11:45 am.

2:20 PM Defendant Nicholas James Size not in court.  Attorney Brian Juech appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
2022CT000011, 2022CT000022 & 22CM24 tracking together:
Atty Juech requests warrant based on defendant's failure to appear on all three cases.

BY THE COURT:  Warrant will issue on all three cases.
Status hearing on April 25, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
**Bond to be signed and returned to the COC office within 14 days

11:16 AM Defendant Nicholas James Size appeared by phone means. Prosecuting Atty Brian J. Juech appeared for State of Wisconsin.
22CM24, 22CT11, 22CT22
  Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint & waives it's reading.  Court advises defendant of the maximum penalties.  BY THE COURT:  Court enters a Not Guilty plea on behalf of the defendant for all cases.  Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.  Defendant understands.  Defendant wishes to contact the PD's office.
BY THE COURT:  Set for status.  Court sets $500 signature bond on 22CM24 & 22CT22.  Status hearing scheduled for April 25, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
